pages.text: 79|16|Dangshi, ta de zhu, ceng zai sheng gu du wa zhong zhaohuan ta shuo:
79|17|“Ni dao falao na li qu ba! Ta que shi beini de.
79|18|Ni dui ta shuo:“Ni yuanyi chengwei chunjie de ren ma?
79|19|Ni yuanyi wo yindao ni renshi ni de zhu, er ni jingwei ta ma?”
79|20|Ta ba na zuida de jixiang zhaoshile falao,
79|21|dan ta fouren, erqie weikang.
79|22|Ranhou zhuanshen er benzou.
79|23|Yushi, zhaoji minzhong, erqie hanjiao,
79|24|shuo:“Wo shi nimen zhizun de zhu.”
79|25|Gu an la yihou shi he jinshi de xingfa chengzhi ta.
79|26|Duiyu weiju de renmen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jianjie.
79|27|Nimen shi geng nan zao ne? Haishi tian shi geng nan zao de ne? Ta ceng jianzaole tian,
79|28|ta sheng qi ta de gaodu, er chengquan ta de xingti,
79|29|ta shi ta de yejian hei'an, bing xian chu ta de guangming.
79|30|Cihou, ta jiang dimian zhankai,
79|31|ta shi dimian yong chu quanshui lai, shengchu zhiwu lai.
79|32|Ta shi shanluan wending,
79|33|yi bian nimen he nimen de shengchu huode xiangshou.
79|34|Da nan lailin de shihou,
79|35|jiushi ren jiang ji qi ziji suozuo de shan e,
79|36|huo yu jiang wei neng jian de ren xianlu chulai de rizi.
79|37|Beini,
79|38|erqie xuanze jinshi shenghuo de ren,
79|39|huo yu bi wei ta de guisu.
79|40|Zhiyu pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shoushen wen, bing jiechu siyu de ren,
79|41|leyuan bi wei ta de guisu.
79|42|Tamen wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou shixian,
79|43|ni zen neng shuoming ta ne?
79|44|Weiyou ni de zhu neng zhi ta de jiujing.
79|45|Ni de jinggao zhiyou bi yu weiju ta de ren,
79|46|tamen zai jian ta di na ri, haoxiang zai fen li zhi douliuguo yi zhao huo yi xi.
